subject: Science
title: A Trip to Space
learningObjectives: Identify the sun, moon, and stars.
Describe when we can see the sun (day) and the moon and stars (night).
Understand that the sun is a star and gives us light and heat.

content.body: Let's go on an adventure to space! We will learn about the sun, the moon, and the stars.

content.alt: A simple drawing of the sun, moon, and stars in space.

content.body: The sun is a big star that we see during the day. At night, we see the moon and many other stars.

questions.question: What do we see in the sky at night?

content.body: ¡Vamos a una aventura al espacio! Aprenderemos sobre el sol, la luna y las estrellas.

questions.question: ¿Qué vemos en el cielo por la noche?
